text: Jilani: “E achikapolo Wangu awala waakulupilile! Mun’jogopani M’mbuje gwenu (Allah). Akwete kupata yambone awala waakolosyisye (itendo yao) pa duniya pano, sano chilambo cha Allah chiwele chakusapanguka (naga nkulepela kutenda ibada upande wine, basi jawulani upande wine). Chisimu akupilila tachipedwa mwakwana malipilo gao mwangawalanjila.”
